title: Saudi plan to cut oil production comes amid push to bolster regional standing
description: Production cut comes amid flurry of moves on the world stage that build on the kingdom’s ongoing push to assert its diplomatic influence on the region and beyond.

title: In Congo’s forests, Islamic State money makes an insurgency more lethal
description: A militant group in the eastern Democratic Republic of Congo is getting financing from the Islamic State, according to defectors and researchers tracking the group.

title: What caused the deadly India train crash in Odisha? Here’s what we know.
description: An investigation is ongoing into what caused the massive three-train crash killed 275 people and injured about 1,000 in eastern India on Friday.

title: Iran to reopen embassy in Saudi Arabia, state media says, as enmity softens
description: After a seven-year closure, Tehran announced Monday that it would reopen its embassy in Riyadh early this week — a major step in moves to revive relations.

title: Shelling hits Russia’s Belgorod region as militias mount cross-border attack
description: At least 4,000 residents were evacuated from Russia’s Belgorod region as towns came under heavy shelling and anti-Putin militia groups claimed to mount new cross-border attacks from Ukraine.

title: U.S. military releases video of near-collision with Chinese destroyer
description: The video, taken from USS Chung-Hoon, shows China’s Luyang III cutting sharply across a U.S. destroyer’s course during an exercise in the Taiwan Strait.

title: At least 80 Afghan students — mostly girls — poisoned in school, all alive
description: The students fell sick soon after entering the classroom, suggesting a gas and mirroring recent incidents in Iran.

title: Defend ‘every inch’ of NATO territory? New strategy is a work in progress.
description: NATO hasn’t committed to the level of permanent on-the-ground troops that some nations wanted. And military mobility remains a problem.

title: Prince Harry goes to court. Here’s what to know.
description: Harry is set to become the first high-ranking British royal to appear in the witness box since 1891.

title: In bright spot for Hong Kong media freedom, journalist wins appeal
description: The case against Bao Choy sparked outrage among journalists over shrinking media freedoms when she was convicted in 2021 of improperly accessing vehicle records.

title: Ukraine live briefing: Fresh strike in Belgorod; Russia says it repelled attack in Donetsk
description: The situation in Russia's Belgorod region remains tense after anti-Russian militias captured troops and a power facility caught fire in a drone attack.

title: In Dnipro, deadly missile attacks prove there is no escaping Russia’s war
description: Recent back-to-back strikes in greater Dnipro were a reminder that Moscow's relentless barrage of missiles can deliver death and destruction at any moment.

title: India cracks down on critics of coal
description: The story of the Hasdeo mine is a case study in how the Modi government uses state power to push through its economic policies and aid a key ally.

title: Mother who served 20 years in deaths of 4 children freed after new evidence
description: Kathleen Folbigg had served most of a 30-year sentence in Australia when an inquiry found reasonable doubt as to whether her four young children had been killed.
